title: OSV-SCALIBR: A library for Software Composition Analysis
summary: Posted by Erik Varga, Vulnerability Management, and Rex Pan, Open Source Security TeamIn December 2022, we announced OSV-Scanner, a tool to enable developers to easily scan for vulnerabilities in their open source dependencies.

title: 5 critical cybersecurity skills gap trends for 2025
summary: Want to stay ahead in 2025? Here's HTB's take on the top trends shaping skills gaps in cybersecurity industry (and how your team can adapt to the changes ahead).
